title: ♪♫HAPPY DAYS AHEAD 🌺in your 1Bdrm, A/C 🌺 Parking 🔑COME TOUR👀
posting_body: ['CLAIR DEL GARDENS IN LONG BEACH, CA', 'Welcome to Clair Del Gardens located in beautiful Long Beach, California.', 'Clair Del Gardens is set in an area known for its famous landmarks and peaceful atmosphere.', 'Clair Del Gardens is the perfect apartment community for any lifestyle.', 'Long beach is a thriving beach city, home to the historic Queen Mary, Los Cerritos Ranch, El Dorado Park and Long Beach Aquarium.', 'Clair Del Gardens is characterized by park-like gardens and grassy knolls.', 'The distinctive residences of Clair Del Gardens present a compelling portrait of gracious living while reflecting a passion for simplicity and comfort.', 'Our well designed one- and two-bedroom floor plans feature high ceilings, spacious closets, and private decks.', "We offer an irresistible combination of residential affordability, convenience, and unrivaled quality that you can't find anywhere else.", "You define your style, we'll provide the best of everything.", 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 176', 'OR Text', '176', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 650 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Newly Renovated Units*', '- Private Balcony or Deck', '- Stainless Steel Gas Range Stove', '- Updated Cabinets and Counter Tops', '- Mirrored Closets Doors on selected units', '- Spacious Closets', '- Air Conditioning*', '- Wood-Like Flooring', '- Stainless Steel Refrigerator', '- Ceiling Fans', 'Community Amenities', '- Recreational Parks Nearby', '- State-Of-The-Art Fitness Center', '- Onsite & On-Call Maintenance', '- Picnic Area with Barbecue', '- Gated Access', '- Assigned Parking', '- Shimmering Swimming Pool', '- Laundry Facility', '- Close to Shopping, and Fantastic Dining Options', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets - small allowed, Max weight 20 lb each, Pet Rent $50.00, Pet Deposit $300.00', 'Comments: One time pet deposit', 'Income Requirements:', 'Total Income, combined together, needs to meet 2.5 times the rent amount', 'Driving Directions', 'Major Cross streets: Cherry & Del Amo Blvd.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Saturday: 8:00AM-5:00PM', 'Clair Del Gardens', '4901 Clair Del Ave., Long Beach, CA, 90807', 'PbkamEprU3']
